name: Monster Manor
description:
Light your way through the Monster Manor  and defeat the evil spirit that haunts these halls!

Made for GBJam8

Controls:

Arrow keys - Walk / Climb

Z - Jump

1-4 - Change Colour Palette

Alternative Controls:

WASD - Walk / Climb

Space - Jump

credits:

    Casey MacNeil

          Dalton Leavey

          Connor Grail
